class Response:
    is_async = True

    async def stream(self, send):
        await send("foobar")
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
async def send(data):
    return data
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
%env DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE example.settings
import django

django.setup()
app = AsyncFileASGIHandler()
response = Response()
app.send_response(response, send)

env: DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=example.settings
